name: Pinball Matador
description:
I made this short game as my personal project for Unity's Create with Code course. It's the first game I've completed in Unity.  Of course, there's a lot more I could've done, but at this point I'm itching to move onto more advanced courses.

Thanks for playing!

Note: I'd recommend playing in full-screen (click the blue button in the bottom-right). Also, for a bit of replay value, if you beat all the waves, the game adds your remaining time (with a 1x/2x/3x difficulty multiplier) to your score.
